text: Va ʙar mardumi Madjan ʙarodarason Su'ajʙro firestodem. Guft: «Ej qavmi man, Ollohro ʙiparasted, sumoro xudoe cuz U nest. Az coniʙi Parvardigoraton nisonae ravsan omadaast. Pajmonavu tarozuro raso ado kuned va ʙa mardum kam mafurused va az on pas, ki zamin ʙa saloh omadaast, dar on fasod makuned, ki agar imon ovardaed, in ʙarojaton ʙehtar ast
